AFFECT /appload/qml/window.qml
TRAVERSE ?#windowCanvas
LOCATE BEFORE ALL
INSERT {
     rotation: root.appName === "KOReader" && root.globalWidth > root.globalHeight ? -90 : 0
}
REBUILD states
LOCATE BEFORE STREAM \  height: parent.height
                        width: windowCanvas.contentAspectRatio * parent.height \
REMOVE LOCATED
INSERT STREAM \
			height: windowCanvas.rotation === 0 ? parent.height : parent.width
			width: windowCanvas.rotation === 0 ? windowCanvas.contentAspectRatio * parent.height : windowCanvas.contentAspectRatio * parent.width \
END REBUILD
END TRAVERSE
END AFFECT
